name: Crash Race - The racing car game in 8 bit style
name_original: Crash Race - The racing car game in 8 bit style
description:
Crash Race is an addictive pixel racing, don't let your car crashes, is a simple but challenging driving/racing game where all you have to do is drive in the track.

Enjoy the reinterpretation of old-school gameplay in combination with perfect controls.

Beat your Best Score using your super fast reflexes!

Using two fingers you have full control of your car to make exciting turns !

Some Game Features:
- Fun addictive Challenge
- Fun 8-Bit graphics
- Retro Style Gaming
- 13 laps
- 4 cars

Enjoy it !
